message.content: cloudflare containers 使用可能はいつから？公式のみ調査対象として

content.text: I'll search for information about when Cloudflare containers became available using official sources only.

input.query: Cloudflare containers launch date announcement official

content.content:
Web search results for query: "Cloudflare containers launch date announcement official"

I'll search for information about Cloudflare's containers launch date announcement.I'll search for information about Cloudflare's containers launch date announcement.

Links: [{"title":"Simple, scalable, and global: Containers are coming to Cloudflare Workers in June 2025","url":"https://blog.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-containers-coming-2025/"},{"title":"Our container platform is in production. It has GPUs. Here’s an early look","url":"https://blog.cloudflare.com/container-platform-preview/"},{"title":"Cloudflare | Press Releases","url":"https://www.cloudflare.com/press-releases/"},{"title":"The Cloudflare Blog: Containers","url":"https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/containers/"},{"title":"What's New at Cloudflare | Cloudflare","url":"https://www.cloudflare.com/whats-new/"},{"title":"The Cloudflare Blog","url":"https://blog.cloudflare.com/"},{"title":"Cloudflare Introduces Cloudflare for AI, a Comprehensive Suite of Tools to Safeguard AI for Businesses at Scale | Cloudflare","url":"https://www.cloudflare.com/press-releases/2025/cloudflare-introduces-cloudflare-for-ai/"},{"title":"Welcome to Developer Week 2025","url":"https://blog.cloudflare.com/welcome-to-developer-week-2025/"},{"title":"Thirteen new MCP servers from Cloudflare you can use today","url":"https://blog.cloudflare.com/thirteen-new-mcp-servers-from-cloudflare/"},{"title":"Containers at the edge: it’s not what you think, or maybe it is","url":"https://blog.cloudflare.com/containers-on-the-edge/"}]

Based on the search results, I found the official announcement about Cloudflare's containers launch date:

Cloudflare Containers are coming this June. In late June, we plan to release Containers in open beta, as announced in their blog post from April 16, 2025.

The key details from the official announcement include:

1. **Launch Date**: In late June, we plan to release Containers in open beta

2. **Product Name**: Cloudflare Containers

3. **Key Features**: Run new types of workloads on our network with an experience that is simple, scalable, global and deeply integrated with Workers

4. **Pricing Model**: After 1 TB of free data transfer per month, egress from a Container will be priced per-region

The announcement was made during Cloudflare's Developer Week 2025, and they also revealed that they already use it in production, for AI inference and more, including their Browser Rendering API.

The platform represents a significant expansion of Cloudflare's compute capabilities beyond their existing Workers platform, allowing developers to run containerized workloads across Cloudflare's global network.

content.text:
Cloudflare公式によると、Cloudflare Containersは**2025年6月下旬**にオープンベータとして利用可能になる予定です。

この発表は2025年4月16日にCloudflareの公式ブログで行われました。
